caption.p: Millingtonia hortensis reversed H 2O 2-induced cellular senescence in SK-N-SH cells. The β-galatoxidase assay was used to investigate the percent of β-Galactosidase-positive cells in SK-N-SH cells (a). The western blot analysis was used for determining the expression of Sirt1 (b). The values present the mean ± standard error of the mean from 3 independent experiments. *** P < 0.001, in comparison with the control treatment; # P < 0.05, ## P < 0.01, ### P < 0.001, in comparison with the H 2O 2 treatment alone
